nodes.text: Stories of Caarimon is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force adventure Belly of the Beaast. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on May 1 2003 and took the form of a holo-clip of reporter Melanda Forswoth interviewing sentients on the street about the Caarites. While interviewing an individual known as "Falsswon", the camera is shot. Yara Grugara then reports that Forswoth has not been seen since the holo-clip and appeals for information from the audience.
